name: Andrea BRUCK, Individually And On Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANIES, Individually And On Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Bruck v. Pennsylvania National Insurance Companies

parties: Andrea BRUCK, Individually And On Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANIES, Individually And On Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED but LIMITED to the following:
Whether the Superior Court erred in affirming the lower court’s granting of Respondent’s Motion for Summary Judgment.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
685 A.2d 1390
Andrea BRUCK, Individually And On Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioner, v. PENNSYLVANIA NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANIES, Individually And On Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 1996.
